item.title: API - scheduled deletion of deprecated API routes (GET /order/catalog/formatted/cloud)
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 2, 2026, 09:00 - 09:02 UTC

Sep 17, 13:21 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our API endpoints (https://eu.api.ovh.com, https://ca.api.ovh.com).

Start time : 02/03/2026 09:00 UTC
End time : 02/03/2026 09:02 UTC
Maintenance : Scheduled deletion of deprecated API routes will be performed.
Service impact : Impacted API routes are GET /order/catalog/formatted/cloud.
Service improvement : The deprecated API routes are replaced by a new API route that provide the same level of features:

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Support] - Help Center and the Community Maintenance notification
item.description:
Sep 25, 21:20 UTC
Completed - All services are operational. No more impact since 21:09 UTC.

Sep 25, 20:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 25, 15:05 UTC
Scheduled - Dear Customers,
We’re hereby inform you that the Help Center and the Community portal will be under maintenance as part of our continuous improvement. We apologize for any inconveniences.

Start time : 25/09/2025 20:00 UTC
End time : 25/09/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : Help Center/Customer Support and Community portal won't be accessible during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will have to carry out interventions on our Help Center/Customer Support and Community portal .
Workaround : If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency.
You can also access our documentation directly on our GitHub repository : https://github.com/ovh/docs/blob/develop/pages/index.md


Thank you for your understanding.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible.

Workaround : If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency.
You can also access our documentation directly on our GitHub repository : https://github.com/ovh/docs/blob/develop/pages/index.md
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Help Center and Community Portal.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Customer service] API/Control panel/Order funnel degraded service
item.description:
Jul 28, 17:40 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our has been resolved.

Start time : 28/07/2025 14:25 UTC
End time : 28/07/2025 17:30 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Here are some supplementary details :

Impacted Service(s) : High error rates have been detected on API impacting Customer Panel, OVHcloud API (eu.api.ovh.com, ca.api.ovh.com) and Order funnel.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 28, 14:35 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 28/07/2025 14:25 UTC
Service impact: High error rates have been detected on API impacting Customer Panel, OVHcloud API (eu.api.ovh.com, ca.api.ovh.com) and Order funnel.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
